name: Dream Core
description:
A Catwalk of Dreams...

It was Sunday morning, when suddenly you are called by the bosses to do a job. But things change over time.

DEATH IS GETTING CLOSER

Explore a giant world with amazing gameplay mechanics like: Quests, Crafting, Achievements, Professions, Multiplayer Item Matching and much more!

MULTIPLAYER THE MULTIPLAYER IS IN ALPHA and the ping can vary a lot!

Invite or join public rooms and play the shared fear.

 

IMPORTANT NOTICE!
This game contains: Loud noises, screen effects, nightmares and disturbances depending on some Jumpscares. Proceed at your discretion.
